mandatoryCapture.explanation: If capturing an opponent's piece is possible, the player is forced to do so.

canCaptureBackwards.explanation: If capturing an opponent's piece is possible when jumping backwards, allow it. (A king can jump backwards, even if this rule is set to false.)

flyingKing.explanation: The king can move more than one tile in one direction. (e.g. The king can capture an opposing piece that is 3 tiles away, and stop on one of the unoccupied squares behind it.)
